english.segment1: Proclaim Your awesome power. Tell of mighty deeds. Declare Your future kingdom. Of everlasting peace
english.segment2: And my eyes they look unto You always. And I am captured by Your Majesty
english.segment3: All of my days. I will sing of Your greatness. All of my days. I will speak of Your grace. All of my days. I will tell of Your wonderous love. Your love in my life. Your love
english.segment4: All Your works will praise You. Your children bless Your name. We speak of all Your goodness. We walk in fields of grace
